faucet.title: Testnet Faucet
faucet.text: If you already have an account, faucet yourself to get more Celo Dollars.

payments.title: Send and Request Payments
payments.text: Account start with 10 cUSD of Testnet funds. Try sending and requesting payments. Use the faucet page if you run out.

exchange.title: Exchange cUSD and cGLD
exchange.text: Check the exchange rate and swap between Celoâ€™s stable coin (cUSD) and variable value token (cGLD) as you see fit.

useSeed: Use your seed phrase to import your account into the Celo wallet.
